venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
Presented by John James Jacoby

bbPress has been rewritten from the ground up as a plugin for WordPress. This talk will go in-depth into how bbPress fits inside of WordPress without compromising performance or ease-of-use. It will cover the hidden powers of WordPress Custom Post Types and Taxonomies, advanced actions and filters, how to write plugins that can have their own plugins, and more!

John James Jacoby is Master of Alliteration at Automattic, Inc. Lead developer of BuddyPress and bbPress. Lover of naps, grilled cheese, and puppies.
item.name: BWPM Sep2011 #1: bbPress 2.0 [Dev]
